dct_description_sm: Illustrée par L. Mols-Marchal ; Etablissement Géographique rue St. Jean, 48 Bruxelles. Déposée.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian
Includes illustrations of buildings, coins (divided into gold, copper, and nickel), flags, and objects related to the metric system (with names and descriptions of measurements)
Flags include France, Namur, Prusse, Luxembourg, Autriche, Lunbourg, Liége, Bruxelles, Hainaut, Belgique, Flandre Ori., Italie, Flandre Occ., Russie, Anvers, and Gde. Bretagne
Shows railways, boundaries, routes under construction, roads, drainage
Latest date on coin illustrations is 1867
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
